an10.76:1.1: “Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamma loke na samvijjeyyum, na tathagato loke uppajjeyya araham sammasambuddho, na tathagatappavedito dhammavinayo loke dibbeyya.
an10.76:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamma loke na samvijjeyyum, na tathagato loke uppajjeyya araham sammasambuddho, na tathagatappavedito dhammavinayo loke dibbeyya.
an10.76:1.5: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, ime tayo dhamma loke samvijjanti tasma tathagato loke uppajjati araham sammasambuddho, tasma tathagatappavedito dhammavinayo loke dibbati.
an10.76:2.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo jatim pahatum jaram pahatum maranam pahatum.
an10.76:2.3: Ragam appahaya, dosam appahaya, moham appahaya—
an10.76:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaya abhabbo jatim pahatum jaram pahatum maranam pahatum.
an10.76:3.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo ragam pahatum dosam pahatum moham pahatum.
an10.76:3.3: Sakkayaditthim appahaya, vicikiccham appahaya, silabbataparamasam appahaya—
an10.76:3.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaya abhabbo ragam pahatum dosam pahatum moham pahatum.
an10.76:4.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo sakkayaditthim pahatum vicikiccham pahatum silabbataparamasam pahatum.
an10.76:4.3: Ayonisomanasikaram appahaya, kummaggasevanam appahaya, cetaso linattam appahaya—
an10.76:4.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaya abhabbo sakkayaditthim pahatum vicikiccham pahatum silabbataparamasam pahatum.
an10.76:5.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo ayoniso manasikaram pahatum kummaggasevanam pahatum cetaso linattam pahatum.
an10.76:5.3: Mutthassaccam appahaya, asampajannam appahaya, cetaso vikkhepam appahaya—
an10.76:5.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaya abhabbo ayonisomanasikaram pahatum kummaggasevanam pahatum cetaso linattam pahatum.
an10.76:6.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo mutthassaccam pahatum asampajannam pahatum cetaso vikkhepam pahatum.
an10.76:6.3: Ariyanam adassanakamyatam appahaya, ariyadhammassa asotukamyatam appahaya, uparambhacittatam appahaya—
an10.76:6.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaya abhabbo mutthassaccam pahatum asampajannam pahatum cetaso vikkhepam pahatum.
an10.76:7.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo ariyanam adassanakamyatam pahatum ariyadhammassa asotukamyatam pahatum uparambhacittatam pahatum.
an10.76:7.3: Uddhaccam appahaya, asamvaram appahaya, dussilyam appahaya—
an10.76:7.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaya abhabbo ariyanam adassanakamyatam pahatum ariyadhammassa asotukamyatam pahatum uparambhacittatam pahatum.
an10.76:8.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo uddhaccam pahatum asamvaram pahatum dussilyam pahatum.
an10.76:8.3: Assaddhiyam appahaya, avadannutam appahaya, kosajjam appahaya—
an10.76:8.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaya abhabbo uddhaccam pahatum asamvaram pahatum dussilyam pahatum.
an10.76:9.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo assaddhiyam pahatum avadannutam pahatum kosajjam pahatum.
an10.76:9.3: Anadariyam appahaya, dovacassatam appahaya, papamittatam appahaya—
an10.76:9.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaya abhabbo assaddhiyam pahatum avadannutam pahatum kosajjam pahatum.
an10.76:10.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo anadariyam pahatum dovacassatam pahatum papamittatam pahatum.
an10.76:10.3: Ahirikam appahaya, anottappam appahaya, pamadam appahaya—
an10.76:10.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme appahaya abhabbo anadariyam pahatum dovacassatam pahatum papamittatam pahatum.
an10.76:11.2: So pamatto samano abhabbo anadariyam pahatum dovacassatam pahatum papamittatam pahatum.
an10.76:11.3: So papamitto samano abhabbo assaddhiyam pahatum avadannutam pahatum kosajjam pahatum.
an10.76:11.4: So kusito samano abhabbo uddhaccam pahatum asamvaram pahatum dussilyam pahatum.
an10.76:11.5: So dussilo samano abhabbo ariyanam adassanakamyatam pahatum ariyadhammassa asotukamyatam pahatum uparambhacittatam pahatum.
an10.76:11.6: So uparambhacitto samano abhabbo mutthassaccam pahatum asampajannam pahatum cetaso vikkhepam pahatum.
an10.76:11.7: So vikkhittacitto samano abhabbo ayonisomanasikaram pahatum kummaggasevanam pahatum cetaso linattam pahatum.
an10.76:11.8: So linacitto samano abhabbo sakkayaditthim pahatum vicikiccham pahatum silabbataparamasam pahatum.
an10.76:11.9: So vicikiccho samano abhabbo ragam pahatum dosam pahatum moham pahatum.
an10.76:11.10: So ragam appahaya dosam appahaya moham appahaya abhabbo jatim pahatum jaram pahatum maranam pahatum.
an10.76:12.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo jatim pahatum jaram pahatum maranam pahatum.
an10.76:12.3: Ragam pahaya, dosam pahaya, moham pahaya—
an10.76:12.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme pahaya bhabbo jatim pahatum jaram pahatum maranam pahatum.
an10.76:13.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo ragam pahatum dosam pahatum moham pahatum.
an10.76:13.3: Sakkayaditthim pahaya, vicikiccham pahaya, silabbataparamasam pahaya—
an10.76:13.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme pahaya bhabbo ragam pahatum dosam pahatum moham pahatum.
an10.76:14.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo sakkayaditthim pahatum vicikiccham pahatum silabbataparamasam pahatum.
an10.76:14.3: Ayonisomanasikaram pahaya, kummaggasevanam pahaya, cetaso linattam pahaya—
an10.76:14.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme pahaya bhabbo sakkayaditthim pahatum vicikiccham pahatum silabbataparamasam pahatum.
an10.76:15.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo ayonisomanasikaram pahatum kummaggasevanam pahatum cetaso linattam pahatum.
an10.76:15.3: Mutthassaccam pahaya, asampajannam pahaya, cetaso vikkhepam pahaya—
an10.76:15.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme pahaya bhabbo ayonisomanasikaram pahatum kummaggasevanam pahatum cetaso linattam pahatum.
an10.76:16.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo mutthassaccam pahatum asampajannam pahatum cetaso vikkhepam pahatum.
an10.76:16.3: Ariyanam adassanakamyatam pahaya, ariyadhammassa asotukamyatam pahaya, uparambhacittatam pahaya—
an10.76:16.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme pahaya bhabbo mutthassaccam pahatum asampajannam pahatum cetaso vikkhepam pahatum.
an10.76:17.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo ariyanam adassanakamyatam pahatum ariyadhammassa asotukamyatam pahatum uparambhacittatam pahatum.
an10.76:17.3: Uddhaccam pahaya, asamvaram pahaya, dussilyam pahaya—
an10.76:17.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme pahaya bhabbo ariyanam adassanakamyatam pahatum ariyadhammassa asotukamyatam pahatum uparambhacittatam pahatum.
an10.76:18.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo uddhaccam pahatum asamvaram pahatum dussilyam pahatum.
an10.76:18.3: Assaddhiyam pahaya, avadannutam pahaya, kosajjam pahaya—
an10.76:18.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme pahaya bhabbo uddhaccam pahatum asamvaram pahatum dussilyam pahatum.
an10.76:19.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo assaddhiyam pahatum avadannutam pahatum kosajjam pahatum.
an10.76:19.3: Anadariyam pahaya, dovacassatam pahaya, papamittatam pahaya—
an10.76:19.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme pahaya bhabbo assaddhiyam pahatum avadannutam pahatum kosajjam pahatum.
an10.76:20.1: Tayome, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo anadariyam pahatum dovacassatam pahatum papamittatam pahatum.
an10.76:20.3: Ahirikam pahaya, anottappam pahaya, pamadam pahaya—
an10.76:20.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo dhamme pahaya bhabbo anadariyam pahatum dovacassatam pahatum papamittatam pahatum.
an10.76:21.2: So appamatto samano bhabbo anadariyam pahatum dovacassatam pahatum papamittatam pahatum.
an10.76:21.3: So kalyanamitto samano bhabbo assaddhiyam pahatum avadannutam pahatum kosajjam pahatum.
an10.76:21.4: So araddhaviriyo samano bhabbo uddhaccam pahatum asamvaram pahatum dussilyam pahatum.
an10.76:21.5: So silava samano bhabbo ariyanam adassanakamyatam pahatum ariyadhammassa asotukamyatam pahatum uparambhacittatam pahatum.
an10.76:21.6: So anuparambhacitto samano bhabbo mutthassaccam pahatum asampajannam pahatum cetaso vikkhepam pahatum.
an10.76:21.7: So avikkhittacitto samano bhabbo ayonisomanasikaram pahatum kummaggasevanam pahatum cetaso linattam pahatum.
an10.76:21.8: So alinacitto samano bhabbo sakkayaditthim pahatum vicikiccham pahatum silabbataparamasam pahatum.
an10.76:21.9: So avicikiccho samano bhabbo ragam pahatum dosam pahatum moham pahatum.
an10.76:21.10: So ragam pahaya dosam pahaya moham pahaya bhabbo jatim pahatum jaram pahatum maranam pahatun”ti.
